item.title: FOIA Requests for Body-Worn Camera Videos (EXPERT NEEDED!) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for an expert who can request new and up-to-date body-worn camera footage by submitting FOIA requests.

We run a very popular YouTube channel and are seeking an expert in this field. You will be heavily rewarded if you can find unique and new body-worn camera footage that hasn't been seen on other bodycam channels.

If you're wondering about the content we post, it is similar to:
https://www.youtube.com/@CodeBlueCam/videos

Please reach out if you're interested.





Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 28, 2024 23:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Videography

item.title: Motion Graphics Editor for Social Media Posts - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Motion Graphics Editor & Researcher to create engaging and stylized video content for TikTok and Instagram. Your tasks will include researching and clipping relevant videos from sources like YouTube and editing them into compelling short-form content.

Responsibilities:

- Research and find relevant videos on specific subjects from YouTube and other sources.
- Clip and compile these videos into engaging content for TikTok and Instagram.
- Edit and produce high-quality, stylized video clips suitable for social media.
- Collaborate on content strategy to ensure alignment with our brand.

Requirements:

- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Strong research skills for finding and clipping relevant video content.
- Understanding of visual consistency and branding for social media.
- Ability to produce engaging and stylized video content for TikTok and Instagram.

Application Instructions:
Submit your portfolio along with the sample task. Highlight any relevant experience and provide examples of videos you have created before.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 23:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit 45-60min Instructional Workout Video - Upwork
item.description:
I need an experienced editor to combine about 6-7 video segments with a complete total running time of about 45-60min.
Put titles on each segment (Title of Workout, Warm-up...segment names...cool down/stretch etc.).
Put the music that I have chosen for each segment and adjust the audio so you can still hear me speaking over the music.
Increase the sound of the audio on the intense parts of the workouts for additional motivation.

I would review the final edit and provide any further notes.  I have been creating workout videos for 20years and I know exactly what I need for the final video so it makes it quite easy to edit.

From my experience this will probably only take 3-4 hours for an experienced editor.




Posted On: June 28, 2024 22:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, DaVinci Resolve, Testimonial Video, Adobe After Effects, Music Video, Video Editing, Adobe Audition, Microsoft Word, Adobe Acrobat, Adobe InDesign, Videography, Video Post-Editing, 2D Animation, Subtitles

Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Coding tutorial video creator for PyMuPDF - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video tutorial content creator with experience in Python programming to join our team on a short-term basis with potential for a long-term role. This position involves creating engaging and educational video content to help our audience understand and effectively use PyMuPDF, our open-source Python library for data extraction, analysis, conversion, and manipulation of PDF (and other) documents.

We are building our YouTube and TikTok presence and would like you to create both long and short form video coding tutorials showcasing common functions with PyMuPDF and PyMuPDF4LLM, our new package to extract PDF content for LLM & RAG environments. You will be managing our channels and working closely with our engineering and marketing teams.

PyMuPDF Documentation - https://pymupdf.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html
PyMuPDF4LLM Documentation - https://pymupdf4llm.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

Video posting schedule: 1 long form (YouTube) and 2 short form videos a week (YouTube Shorts, TikTok).

Questions for Candidates:

1. Can you share examples of your previous work in creating educational video content? Please include any links to your YouTube, TikTok, or other platforms.

2. Do you have experience with Python programming? If so, can you provide examples of projects you’ve worked on?

3. Are you familiar with PyMuPDF or similar PDF manipulation packages? If yes, please describe your experience.

4. How comfortable are you with large language models and AI integration? Have you created content related to these topics before?

Hourly Range: $25.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 22:40 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube Video, TikTok Video, Explainer Video, Voice-Over Recording, How To, Python, Coding Lesson
Skills: YouTube Video, TikTok Video, Explainer Video, Voice-Over Recording, How To, Python, Coding Lesson
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
As a Video Editor at Shownmedia, you will play a crucial role in shaping the visual impact of our direct-to-consumer ad campaigns on platforms like TikTok and Meta. This position involves working closely with our creative team to edit and assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches the Creative Strategist’s vision and is suitable for advertising. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of editing software, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to effectively tell a story through video. You will be responsible for editing video content that is engaging, visually appealing, and on-brand, ensuring that it drives viewer engagement and meets the marketing objectives of our clients.

Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency

Requirements:
- Able to work in Eastern Time Zone.
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team.
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Job Type: Full-time

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 22:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Script for Bradford (Mom with Dementia in Memory Care Facility) - Upwork
item.description:
Create a UGC script for the creator (and Kahn's friend) Bradford. Please include a shot list too for Bradford. This video could be anywhere from 1 min to 3 min in final form.

He has JubileeTV installed at his mom's room in a Memory Care Senior Living facility (not sure how they refer to it exactly).

Bradford primarily uses "Telescope" feature where he controls his mom's TV remotely but if "Passive Mode" (doc below) seems relevant, try to incorporate it too. Video calling can also be included re Cognitive decline is common among socially isolated seniors: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7274632/

Here are resources:
Bradford's IG: https://www.instagram.com/rahmstagram/ (he has a bunch of dementia/mom-related content already; we can use it or the general plot points for your video).

Note: he's involved with the memorycare community (his job); https://www.caringkindnyc.org/ (we should mention it)

All this footage is available:
https://www.instagram.com/p/C3Sl_ObM6ak/

JTV reviews about parents who have dementia:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J44V1xDpSu7dyBsK4udt1Fn0sdtTxJfNO0_845n_T_c/edit?usp=sharing

Passive Mode brief:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eAPgiIXA99Vw1ZEyj5gAVOUXE4xYuyopuIZQ_2Eqbfg/edit?usp=sharing

UGC inspo:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SnauDuhsvamdAKypxWAd--fZ2ELTWo8Mgd338jlIrHk/edit?usp=sharing

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 28, 2024 22:38 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Creative Writing
Skills: Creative Writing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
